A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
When the force awakens was released I went to see it in theatre a dozen times. I wasn't the biggest fan of the movie but it was watchable. 

With this movie once is enough. There are good points in the movie but the experience as a whole is a let down. 

The dialogue is written as thou it took place on earth. Every scene was rushed with no time to settle into the story. 

I won't be wasting another cent on this movie.
